title: Esports Skin Permanent Not Given from MSI Capsule
body: I bought the MSI 2019 Pass and opened my four orbs and I got TPA Ezreal permanent as a bonus, it appeared in the top right corner and my collection had a yellow dot on it but when I click collection, it says I don't own the skin!

replies.body:
Legacy or permanent/auto redemption loot content is often slower to redeem, the solution usually being to wait an hour and relog. 

However, there are also some hextech crafting issues at the moment which are likely affecting this as well, so you may not get access to that skin until those issues are resolved, or it may be much slower than usual.

https://status.leagueoflegends.com/#oce

>We are aware of issues currently affecting the Hextech Crafting system, and are working on a fix.
